description: DR JAMES D. BOYS is an Associate Professor of International Political Studies at Richmond University and was Senior Visiting Research Fellow at King’s College, London. He has strong media links with radio and television, appearing as a commentator on American political issues on the BBC, Sky News, CNBC and Al Jazeera English. He is a regular contributor to the radio stations Monocle 24 and LBC Radio.
name: James D. Boys
